constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 115 (Wednesday, July 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 8348.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Seciton VIII, Clause 14: ``Congress shall have
the power to . . . makr rules for the government and
regulation of the land and naval forces . . .''
[Page H6335]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Energy, the Environment and Cyber.

title: United States NATO Force Deployment Policy Act of 2022
